metadata.title: Multi ColorTwo Pieces Set of Swarovski Coffee Cup - Crystal Coated Coffee Cup - Ottoman Turkish Greek Arabic Coffee Espresso Cups - Golden Color Serving Cups and Saucer Set
features: ✔Turkish Coffee Set: If you are looking for authentic, TWO pieces set of Turkish coffee cups then you are in the right place. You can use Turkish coffee set for two when you want to drink coffee with your special friend.
✔Swarovski Ornaments: We proudly offer Swarovski crystal coated design golden color set of Ottoman Turkish Greek Arabic Coffee Espresso cups and saucers Two Pieces set.

✔ What You Will Get: This Turkish coffee set includes 13 Pieces Espresso/Turkish Coffee Cup Saucer Set for 2 - Traditional Anatolian Patterned Design Oriental Ottoman Coffee Cup (2 inner Porcelain cups for coffee, 2 brass cup holder, 2 saucers, 2 lids, 1 serving tray, 1 Turkish delight bowl, 1 lid of the bowl, Two Pieces of Golden color spoon -Stone color of spoons may vary) Color: GOLDEN.

✔ Care Instructions: Products have been produced Against to Blackening. Don't Wash Them in The Dishwasher. The porcelain cup is removable from the brass holder and machine washable. Other parts are Not suitable for machine wash.
✔ Satisfaction Guaranteed: Based on the confidence in the quality, our Swarovski Crystal Coated Coffee Cup Set is protected by worry-free support. Customer satisfaction is our top priority.
description: If you are looking for authentic, TWO pieces set of Turkish coffee cups, then you are in the right place. Now you can serve Turkish coffee in a real utensil of motherland’s culture. The designs on the espresso cups and saucers are unique and come straight from traditional elements of the Ottoman artwork. These are the PUREST Turkish culture cups & saucers. One of a kind coffee cups that show exactly the serving level of your Turkish coffee. We're proud to offer Swarovski Crystal Coated design Two Pieces Golden Color Set of Ottoman Turkish Greek Arabic Coffee Espresso Serving Cup Saucer Set. This Turkish coffee set includes 13 Pieces Espresso/Turkish Coffee Cup Saucer Set for 2 - Traditional Anatolian Patterned Design Oriental Ottoman Coffee Cup (2 inner Porcelain cups for coffee, 2 brass cup holder, 2 saucers, 2 lids, 1 serving tray, 1 Turkish delight bowl, 1 lid of the bowl, Two Pieces of Golden color spoon -Stone color of spoons may vary) Color: GOLDEN. Products have been produced Against to Blackening. Don't Wash Them in The Dishwasher. The porcelain cup is removable from the brass holder and machine washable. Other parts are not suitable for machine wash.
